name: Peter Padmore the Polygonal Prophet
description:
PLEASE FULL SCREEN FOR YOUR ULTIMATE GAMING PLEASURE

LORE

Peter Padmore was just like everyone else in the world of Super Monster Fighter 2. Life was simple until he was contacted by Polygod, the god of polygons. Polygod tells Peter of a new console that will feature Super Monster Fighter 3… and new graphics! Super Monster Fighter 3 must be stopped to keep customer attention on Super Monster Fighter 2. Polygod declares Peter as his prophet, and Peter journeys across the three realms to stop the new game. However, Peter is not the strongest, so he will eventually die. When he dies, a new prophet will take his place (renaming the title of the game), and follow Peter’s footsteps.

CONTROLS

Movement - WASD

Attack - Left Click

Dodge Roll - Space Bar

Pet Enemies - Right Click (essentially does nothing)

FEATURES

Music Player featuring hits from the one and only ojman654!!!

3 Action-Packed Realms

  • Realm 1 (Super Monster Fighter 2) - Peter's Home
  • Realm 2 (Super Monster Fighter 1) - the origins of the future (deep) (know your history)
  • Realm 3 (Super Monster Fighter 3) - the threat to polygonal life as Peter knows it

3 Action-Packed Combat Rooms

  • Town
  • Forest
  • Farm

3 Action-Packed Weapons

  • Sword
  • Axe
  • Mace

3 Action-Packed Times of Day

  • Day
  • Afternoon
  • Night

Annnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnddddd

Varied action-packed randomly-generated customization!

KNOWN BUGS

  • For some reason, sometimes the player can play as Peter's ghost. Cool
